job_description: AtNespresso, our mission is to create the highest quality, most sustainable cup of coffee. By caring for our employees, our farmers, the environment and our customers, we are dedicated to connecting our community with the best possible products and customer experiences.Nespresso Thailand is a young and fast growing market and we are looking for an experiencedBusiness Operations Manager who would play a key role in enabling the B2C business by doing analysis and driving activities that will improve sales performance across Retail, Trade and eCommerce, and to provide business support in terms of project management, workforce management and third party vendor management to drive efficiency across the B2C sales channels.The main deliverables of this role include:A)Channel performance analysis and business planningAnalyze and identify channel development and trend.Develop and implement new sales channel/Retail or Trade concept, to ensure optimisation of sales and service coverage for the entire network.B)Project and workforce managementManage new business development for Boutique (e.g. new Boutique opening, Boutique renovation and opening of Recruitment Booths) and Trade (e.g. new POS expansion, mobile tasting, in-store activities).Establish strong partnership with Landlords and manage the negotiation of rental terms and agreement of Boutiques, Recruitment Booths and Trade.Manage good working relationship with Third Party Providers to ensure Trade and Boutique projects are delivered in adherence to budget, schedule and scope.Facilitate multi-channel workforce management, including Third Party workforce.C)Third Party ManagementEffectively manage Third Party Providers and evaluate actual performance against the pre-defined expectation, proactively identify any potential problem, and determine the right course of action to mitigate risk.Monitor the ways of working of Third Party Providers to ensure that it is in line with the Nespresso brand purpose and compliant to Nestle standards and policies.Collaborate with Procurement and Legal to ensure that Service Level Agreements with Third Party Providers are negotiated in the best interest of the Company.D)Drive proposed activities, provide other business support and implementation merchandising initiativesProvide insight and recommendation to drive additional traffic and sales, both on- and offline.Liaise and collaborate with Marketing Team to develop the optimum acquisition and activation strategy.Deliver back-office support, including the alignment of internal communication.Provide business excellence support (i.e. process and tools)Implement merchandising initiatives in the B2C Channels, both on- and offlineThe ideal candidate should have:Experience in Partnership Management/3rd Party Management/Field Sales Management.Strong development, implementation and planning capabilities.Strong project management skill and the ability to manage complex tasks.Excellent communication and negotiation skills.Extensive organisational and leadership experience.Learn more about working in Nespresso by visiting our website:https://www.nespresso.com/careers/?m=TH&l=EN#/

job_title: Customer Service Supervisor - Trading Biochemical Organisation
job_description: The client is looking for the suitable candidate - "customer service supervisor". The person must have a strong leadership skill with a great management style. He/she would be leading a team of more than 4 people. The Customer Service Supervisor responsible for supervising, trains, coaches, and mentors customer service staff on how to deliver exceptional customer service. Client DetailsThe company is the large trading chemical group, running their business in the market for almost 40 years. They have the wide range of products such as fine chemical and reagents, lab instrument and equipment, chemical consumables, etc. Not only selling their products to top leading key clients, but also providing their high stand service with lab supplier sourcing, special chemical service, other applications, etc. DescriptionSupervise a team of customer service to make sure they abide by all company policies and procedures.Provide product information to customers and sell company products both up-selling and cross-selling.Assist in handling incoming service call inquiries and to solve customer complaints responsively.Prepare quotation, issue sale order and all relevant supporting documents to serve customer order completely.Assist in developing & training customer service team, technical sales and service skills.Coordinate with logistic team informing order status to customers.Prepare and analyze report related to customer service management and as per line manager commands.Working closely with Manager to manage all aspects of the customer service team to ensure smooth customer center operations (line, call, fax, Facebook and email) and that key KPI targets are met.Analyze areas for improvement and work with manager to improve customer service operation process.Prepare and monitor case registration.Perform any other duties as may be assigned.  ProfileBachelor's degree in Science, major in Chemistry, Biotechnology Science related field.Background in science is a plus as our products is highly technical.Minimum of 5 years professional experience in customer service, or any sales function.Strong experience with MS Office especially MS Excel skill is required, be able to do pivot report, and create dashboard and different types of data visualization.Handle different types of people characters, team player, and proactiveAble to multi-task and has high attention to detail.Great analytical, problem-solving skills and good new system implementationGood command English verbal and written communication skills.  Job OfferCompetitive base salaryBonus and IncentiveOther allowances  To apply online please click the 'Apply' button below. For a confidential discussion about this role please contact Vichanee Jaewtrakul on +662 012 5064

job_title: Recruitment Consultant (Junior - Senior. level) - Ari, Bangkok
job_description: Adecco Thailand is looking for aRecruitment Consultant to join the world’s leading HR Solutions Company.Adecco Recruitment Consultants are responsible for:Business DevelopmentIt’s a Sales job; you will enjoy contacting clients, understanding their needs and delivering service levels beyond their expectations;You will need to meet weekly/monthly/quarterly KPI targets, including a Sales target with commission incentives.RecruitmentSourcing candidates via various channels including traditional job boards and social media;Attracting high potential candidates and developing a candidate pool to meet our clients requirements;Using both Skills and Behavior-based interviewing techniques to match candidates to the right jobs for their careers;Providing career advice and guidance to candidates. Delivering HR SolutionsAs the leading HR Solutions provider in the world, we offer our clients a full spectrum of HR services beyond the Permanent Recruitment service, and you will be at the forefront of presenting these services to clients; Establish and maintain robust relationships with all related partiesthrough either telephone or face-to-face meetings;To keep both candidates and clients informed about the status of recruitment activities from initial steps until completion.The right candidate for this position has:Bachelor’s degree or higher in any field.At least 1-5 years of experience in HRM and/or Sales & Marketing (any industry).Pleasant and smart personality, and is self-confident with strong interpersonal skills.Superb Skills in the areas of Negotiation, Presentation, Selling, Coordinating and Problem Solving.Ability to work in a dynamic environment.Excellent command of English, oral and written; TOEIC Score of 600 up would be a plus.Computer literacy.If you are looking for an exciting new career challenge, and appreciate the support and opportunities that the world’s largest HR Solutions company can provide, then please click apply and let the journey begin.

Overview:Thai Union is the world’s leading seafood processor. The company with headquarters in Bangkok was founded in 1977, and since 1994 is listed on the Stock Exchange of Thailand (SET). Our core businesses focus largely on Ambient Fish & Seafood business (45%) and Frozen & Chilled seafood (42%), followed by Pet Care and other Value-Added products (13%). Thai Union had revenues of USD 4.1 Billion in 2017.Next to the Group’s private label and OEM business, Thai Union owns several leading shelf-stable seafood product brands, including Chicken of the Sea in the U.S., John West, Petit Navire, King Oscar and Mareblu in Europe, and Sealect and Fisho in Asia. Our global manufacturing footprints cover key strategic locations, including the U.S., Europe, Africa and Asia.We are seeking candidates with drive and passion to join the Group Strategy team at Thai Union. In this role, the Group Strategy Deputy Department Manager (DDM) will work in the Global Strategy team to develop Thai Union’s strategy and monitor its execution. He/she will build and continuously evolve financial models, analyze business performance, and make relevant recommendations to senior management. The DDM will be based in Bangkok and he/she will work closely with members of other Group functions and Operating Companies (OpCos).The successful candidate will be passionate about his/her work, detail-oriented and analytical. He/she will have excellent financial modelling skills, strong project management skills and ability to work on multiple projects simultaneously, effective communication skills (written and verbal), and must be comfortable in working in an ambiguous, dynamic environment and under tight timelines.Key responsibilities:Work on selected high-priority strategic projects, including growth strategies, M&A, business performance improvement, etc.Drive the annual Strategic Planning process; directly work with the OpCos to define their strategic priorities and implementation roadmapsSupport the Monthly and Quarterly Business Reviews; liaise with the OpCos and Group Finance to compile the required data and derive actionable recommendationsIndependently conduct selected industry and company analyses; gain insights on markets, competitors, relevant consumer trends, etc.Requirements:2-4 years of experience, with at least two years in strategy consulting (top-tier strategy firm preferred)Bachelor degree in related fields requiredExperience in (fast-moving) consumer goods industriesStrong business acumen, problem solving and advanced financial modelling skillsFluency in written and spoken English required (Thai language skills preferred)Proficient in Microsoft Office Programs (specifically strong in Microsoft Excel and Powerpoint)

job_responsibilities: ['Our client is a leading, global food and speciality chemical ingredients distributor.Responsibilities:Grow our clients’ Pharmaceutical and Nutraceutical ingredients business with existing and new accounts.Sell, market and promote our clients’ products to current and potential customers.Identify new opportunities in the market for future business growth opportunities.Increase sales and gross profit.Establish our clients as a strategic business partner and supplier of choice to Pharmaceutical and Nutraceutical companies.Manage and forecast products sold for both existing and new business achieved.Actively provide reports and market intelligence on a monthly basis or as required by the Company.Determines gross-profit plans by implementing marketing strategies; analyzing trends and results.Liaise with Business Group, Global Technical Marketing team and Principals to ensure strategic initiatives are coordinated and delivered to our customers.Prepare and present technical presentations, workshops, and seminars for product promotion and marketing events, collaborates with Business Unit Manager to control budgets for sales promotion and trade show expenses. Liaise with purchasing regarding stock purchasing and costing requirements.Liaise with customer service personnel in relation to customer orders.']

job_responsibilities: [' Responsibility:Supporting the team leadership in financial planning and strategic planning processes.Managing financial planning, providing timely monthly management reports, and analysis to support business decisions.The company is “Projects” based, so long term accurate planning is required.Being responsible for the reliability of financial and management reporting and compliance with laws and regulations.Monitoring costs and expenses to assist in budget preparation.Preparing the proposal and presentations, meeting agenda, and drafting correspondences for the President and Chairman.Ensuring the legal compliance and handling public relations activities, communicating with the company’s shareholders about their rights and companies’ development, including Corporate Social Responsibility Projects.Planning both financial and operations (Production Costing).']
job_qualifications: [":Master's Degree in Business Administration, Finance, or relative field.Excellent communication and organizational skills.Background in long-term financial planning or experience in “Projects” based work.An analytical mind with problem-solving skillsStrong problem solving, critical thinking, coaching, interpersonal, and verbal and written communication skills.Have the knowledge in general business administration, strategic planning, reporting, finance or economics, laws, and government regulations (the civil and commercial code, public limited company act), public relations.Strong organizational skills that reflect the ability to perform and prioritize multiple tasks seamlessly with excellent attention to detail.Strong background in Accounting or Finance Analysis.Strong in P&L analysis, forecast, and budget management.Good organizational and time management skills.Culturally aware and good English skills.The job is based in Bang Phli/Suvarnabhumi area. job_description: Responsibility:Supporting the team leadership in financial planning and strategic planning processes.Managing financial planning, providing timely monthly management reports, and analysis to support business decisions.The company is “Projects” based, so long term accurate planning is required.Being responsible for the reliability of financial and management reporting and compliance with laws and regulations.Monitoring costs and expenses to assist in budget preparation.Preparing the proposal and presentations, meeting agenda, and drafting correspondences for the President and Chairman.Ensuring the legal compliance and handling public relations activities, communicating with the company’s shareholders about their rights and companies’ development, including Corporate Social Responsibility Projects.Planning both financial and operations (Production Costing).Qualification:Master's Degree in Business Administration, Finance, or relative field.Excellent communication and organizational skills.Background in long-term financial planning or experience in “Projects” based work.An analytical mind with problem-solving skillsStrong problem solving, critical thinking, coaching, interpersonal, and verbal and written communication skills.Have the knowledge in general business administration, strategic planning, reporting, finance or economics, laws, and government regulations (the civil and commercial code, public limited company act), public relations.Strong organizational skills that reflect the ability to perform and prioritize multiple tasks seamlessly with excellent attention to detail.Strong background in Accounting or Finance Analysis.Strong in P&L analysis, forecast, and budget management.Good organizational and time management skills.Culturally aware and good English skills.The job is based in Bang Phli/Suvarnabhumi area.

job_title: Sport Leader at Decathlon Pattaya (Running passion is an advantage )
job_responsibilities: ['Company descriptionDecathlon is one of the biggest sporting goods designer, manufacturer, and retailer based in France, with a big global presence and many sports under one roof. We are very excited to welcome you to our stores in Thailand.Job descriptionOur Sport Leaders are responsible for customer service and sales, department profitability as well as building and coaching teams within their department. You’ll be making decisions for the business from day one by analyzing and planning your commercial activity, forming new ways to boost your sport’s range of products for your local customers and engaging your sports users through the organization of events in and out of the store. Your determination coupled with our training will teach you the fundamentals of how to grow your market share for your favourite sport. You are encouraged to think outside the box and unleash your entrepreneurial spirit.Your responsibilitiesTeam Player - The business and the customer always comes first, together with your colleagues you will ensure that your in-store business is commercial and efficient day by day .Digital - As the retail continues to evolve, you will have the freedom to discover new ways to build your brand through social media and other digital channels.Partnerships - Once your business is thriving in store and online, you can reach out into your community and work with your local sport clubs/schools/businesses to develop partnerships. Here is where you will apply your networking skills in order to strengthen your brand and to make your sport accessible within your community.Customer Service - Your customers will always be your number one priority, you will have the means to listen to their feedback in order to make improvements to your business. At Decathlon we ensure that all our customers remain loyal through our Satisfied or Satisfied policy.Sport business - You will build the best product offering for your customer. You will choose all of your ranges within your sport, adapting your business to the current market. You will organise events in your local area to increase brand awareness and customer participation in sport.']
job_qualifications: ['s• Passionate about sports and excited by your potential to drive impact change in people• Positive, hands-on attitude with a desire to learn• Embrace responsibility and vitality• Able to thrive in a fast-paced environment• Great listener, communicator, and team player• Strong leadership qualities, previous experience in management is a plus• Experience with social media campaigns and data analytics• Basic knowledge of Office and Google Suite is necessary• Flexible schedule and availability on weekends is a mustAdditional information• Competitive salary• Health insurance• Performance bonus• Provident fund• Generous employee discount• A learning environment where you can dive deep and make an impact• Be a shareholder, with an exclusive annual option to invest in Decathlon’s Shares• Wide range of career opportunities locally and globallyMore informationhttps://bethechange.decathlon.com ']
job_description: Company descriptionDecathlon is one of the biggest sporting goods designer, manufacturer, and retailer based in France, with a big global presence and many sports under one roof. We are very excited to welcome you to our stores in Thailand.Job descriptionOur Sport Leaders are responsible for customer service and sales, department profitability as well as building and coaching teams within their department. You’ll be making decisions for the business from day one by analyzing and planning your commercial activity, forming new ways to boost your sport’s range of products for your local customers and engaging your sports users through the organization of events in and out of the store. Your determination coupled with our training will teach you the fundamentals of how to grow your market share for your favourite sport. You are encouraged to think outside the box and unleash your entrepreneurial spirit.Your responsibilitiesTeam Player - The business and the customer always comes first, together with your colleagues you will ensure that your in-store business is commercial and efficient day by day .Digital - As the retail continues to evolve, you will have the freedom to discover new ways to build your brand through social media and other digital channels.Partnerships - Once your business is thriving in store and online, you can reach out into your community and work with your local sport clubs/schools/businesses to develop partnerships. Here is where you will apply your networking skills in order to strengthen your brand and to make your sport accessible within your community.Customer Service - Your customers will always be your number one priority, you will have the means to listen to their feedback in order to make improvements to your business. At Decathlon we ensure that all our customers remain loyal through our Satisfied or Satisfied policy.Sport business - You will build the best product offering for your customer. You will choose all of your ranges within your sport, adapting your business to the current market. You will organise events in your local area to increase brand awareness and customer participation in sport.Qualifications• Passionate about sports and excited by your potential to drive impact change in people• Positive, hands-on attitude with a desire to learn• Embrace responsibility and vitality• Able to thrive in a fast-paced environment• Great listener, communicator, and team player• Strong leadership qualities, previous experience in management is a plus• Experience with social media campaigns and data analytics• Basic knowledge of Office and Google Suite is necessary• Flexible schedule and availability on weekends is a mustAdditional information• Competitive salary• Health insurance• Performance bonus• Provident fund• Generous employee discount• A learning environment where you can dive deep and make an impact• Be a shareholder, with an exclusive annual option to invest in Decathlon’s Shares• Wide range of career opportunities locally and globallyMore informationhttps://bethechange.decathlon.com

job_description: The Assistant Category Development Manager is responsible to drive category growth and profit together with cross-functional teams. Integrating consumer and shopper insight to translate into category strategy and recommending pack and price to fit with the shopper in each channel to maximize category growth and profit. Responsibilities:Developing the category strategy & POP guidelines to ensure sales & profit achievement based on the understanding of consumer/shopper, competitor & channel dynamics.Leading the team in activity development & implementation for the responsible category.Analyzing information using category data to drive sales/off-take & market share.Controlling the profit/loss vs budget & target. Reviewing channel performances. Leading in cross-functional team working to solve problems. Qualifications:Master’s Degree or above preferably in Business Administration or related field.At least 3-5 years’ experience in Trade Marketing field or Data Analysis and Promotion Creating, Planning and Evaluating of FMCG.Experience in POS & Consumer Panel data analysis on different platforms (e.g. Dunnhumby, Nielsen Scantrack, EYC, etc.,) are preferable.Strong leadership as well as interpersonal & communication skills. Strong analytical and work in the data analysis area. Fluency in spoken & written English. Strong presentation skills.

job_title: Technical Sales Manager - Leading Air Filtration
job_description: Our client is a distributor of air filtration and air purification systems. In this position, the successful candidate will maintain and expand relationship with existing key accounts and build relationships with new customers for further growth. The candidate will have a great opportunity to work directly with key regional stakeholders. Client DetailsThe client has established their business in Thailand with over 90 employer headcounts. Over 30 years of their distribution business, they have grown with their own manufacturing in air ventilation and warehouse. DescriptionContact assigned customer accounts or prospects to sell the air filtration/air purification products within Thailand.Generate sales project and deliver successful result.Focus on personal sales targets, new business development, and troubleshooting on problem or key markets such as general industries, hospitals, buildings.Require significant client relationship skills for special markets/complex product lines assigned.Meet personal sales targets as established, incorporating the full range of products/services within identified markets or geography. Typical accounts are highly challenging, complex, and diverse customers who require ongoing client relationship support.Independently prepare sales presentations, contracts, and proposals to ensure successful outcome of transactions.May participate in special projects/programs as assigned, such as training or communications sessions within or outside of the company.  ProfileBachelor's degree in Environmental Engineering, Mechanical Engineering or equivalentAt least 3-5 years sales experience working with Air Filtration/ Air Purifier productsStrong technical and industrial market knowledge of Industrial Air solution is requiredGreat communication, marketing, presentation, persuasion, self-confidence, and sales administration skillsThai nationals with fluent spoken and written English skills  Job OfferBase SalaryCar AllowanceCommissionHealth Care  To apply online please click the 'Apply' button below. For a confidential discussion about this role please contact Paam Yanaranop on +662 012 5039.

In this role, the successful candidate will manage sales of rubber, plastic, foam, film for heat insulator, anti-vibration, and leakage prevention to customers. The candidate will have a great opportunity to work directly with key stakeholders such as senior managers, colleagues, and clients. Client DetailsThe client is a leader for solution provider in fabrication. They have subsidiaries in 18 locations at major production hubs in 7 countries in Asia. Importantly, the client has a strong track record of good business performance and are looking to continue expanding their businesses to the growing market in Thailand. DescriptionAssist manager to the overall responsibility for sales & marketing department.Undertake overall responsibility in terms of technical sales and marketing (Automotive sector).Prepare annual sales forecasts and budgets to set sales performance targets for the department and members as well as formulate sales plans consistent with corporate objectives and ensures proper implementation of these strategies.Manage existing customers and develop new customers, and understand customer's business status, look for business opportunity and foster good customer relationship for revenue growth and customer retention to be consistent with company objectives and market changes. New customer development; promote product, provide recommendation and technical support to customers.Prepare quotations and follow up on sales enquires/proposal from customers.Deliver presentations and hands-on demonstrations of products and technology as well as company profile for the purpose of product sales.Prepare sales visits, maintain customers contact database and update project status/activity reports basis on required by immediate supervisor.Facilitate meetings and workshops/trainings with customers for the management and product marketing as required.Control obsolescence of inventory including disposing of slow-moving stock.Recommend and implement policies & procedures to ensure the highest standard of effectiveness of the indoor sales & outdoor sales team and etc.Staffing and develop the personnel in sales & marketing department.Foster a spirit of unity and team building with the sales and marketing department.Ensure that the daily jobs and duties within the sales office are carried out smoothly and completed in a timely manner with the assistant of the sales admin staff.Manage and supervise the costing of products by sales office staff.Monitor cost of sales to ensure that the profit contribution meet the growth objectives of the company.Perform other duties as assigned. ProfileMale/Female, Thai nationalityAge Bachelor's Degree in Sales, Marketing or Engineering field.Minimum 3 years of experiences in industries (Automotive parts).Competent technical knowledge and good understanding of different products.Fluent in English, both oral and written.Excellent communication, negotiation and presentation skills.Proficient with Windows based applications (Word, Excel, PowerPoint).Customer-driven and results-oriented.Aggressive, persistent, proactive and must be a good team player.Disciplined, hardworking and able to perform under pressure.Have own car and willing to travel for training, trade shows and/or meetings etc.Able to work in Chachoengsao (Wellgrow Industrial Estate)  Job OfferCompetitive Base SalaryAttractive Bonus SchemeGlobal organisation     To apply online please click the 'Apply' button below. For a confidential discussion about this role please contact Paam Yanaranop on +662 012 5039.

job_title: Business Unit Manager - Global Consumer Health company
job_description: A global leading consumer health company is looking for a Business Unit Manager based in their Bangkok Office to support a large, complex business unit with a regional remit across the country. Client DetailsOur client is one of the well-known company for consumer health products and consumer goods.DescriptionDevelops the business plan, strategy and directions of the group to ensure attainment of company sales goals and profitability objectivesPlans and controls budgets and expense within the Brand lines in order to ensure profitabilityReviews and approves the sales and marketing strategies of each line to ensure that they are aligned with company directionRegularly conducts Business Reviews to monitor the lines performance, pinpoint possible gaps and immediately corrects the situation by implementing corrective and preventive actionEstablishes contact in field with key customer's opinion leaders, government officials and ensures continuous development of superior KOL knowledge for competitive advantageApproves and monitors the development and execution of activities to support the brands and related productsEvaluates new business opportunities/brands for possible product launch to ensure continuous profitable growth of the Business unitsProfileBachelor's Degree in Science or Business, MBA Degree is an advantage  7 years' experience as management in a multi-national pharmaceutical or FMCG (personal care products) or Nutritionals (milk or vitamins) companyAt least 2 years' experience at Director levelMust have good presentation, communication and negotiation skillsMust be competent in Marketing Strategic Planning, Marketing Execution and Communication, and in Product Knowledge/Industry AcumenProactive with strong leadership and able to inspire and motivate staffMust have customer relations, collaborative working relationship with customers, peers, and other departments, cross-functional influencingMust have business leadership/acumen, coaching and leadershipJob OfferAttractive PackageMultinational working environment  To apply online please click the 'Apply' button below. For a confidential discussion about this role please contact Jittraporn Lertsiri on +662 012 5061

Job descriptionReporting to the Senior Category Manager in the local marketplace team, the Associate Category Manager will be responsible for the planning and execution to grow the Fashion subcategory. Key focus areas include:Performance strategy & execution: develop subcategory strategy based on various data points, derive action plans and execute with team members to monitor and improve key performance indicatorsAssortment planning & merchandising: develop category knowledge in terms of assortment, styles and price points to understand the gaps and match demand and supply in the marketSellers management: manage relationships with the seller communities with a particular focus on top sellers, acting as a business advisor to ensure their sustainable growth and contribution to the subcategory, as well as working closely with the vendor acquisition team to acquire and groom new sellers to grow strategic assortment within the subcategoryMarketing & onsite management: working closely with cross-functional teams including traffic and marketing teams to plan for campaigns as per the identified assortment and growth direction of the subcategory and manage onsite merchandising and deal hunting from the sellers RequirementBachelor’s Degree or above At least 3-5 years of experience in retail (offline or online), business development, or market researchStrong analytical skills with systematic and structured thinking Excellent negotiation and problem-solving skills Ability to work in a fast-paced and dynamic cross-functional environment Good verbal and written communication skills both English and Thai

Job descriptionManage and drive the Vendor Acquisition team Main objective is to convince Thailand traders, sellers and distributors to join Lazada and list their products to sell on our platformBreak down targets into individual targets for each team member and ensure targets are achievedDefine and develop team’s KPIs Liaises with category team to drive and grow the categories based on current strategy (e.g. Electronics, Health & Beauty, Fashion, Lifestyle etc.) and identify assortment gaps and vendors to fill these gapsTracks employees' performance and conduct individual evaluation Manage employees' incentives scheme RequirementVery commercial driven and strong interest for business development At least 5+ years of work experience in sales or business development Leadership experience and strong desire to build and lead own team Demonstrated ability to manage, prioritize and deliver on multiple projects Strongly motivated to succeed and achieve targets Humble, proactive, self-driven, leads by example e-commerce experience is a plus Excellent verbal and written communication skills in both English and Thai

job_title: Sport Leader at Decathlon Pattaya (Fresh graduate and internship are welcome)
job_responsibilities: ['Company descriptionDecathlon is one of the biggest sporting goods designer, manufacturer, and retailer based in France, with a big global presence and many sports under one roof. We are very excited to welcome you to our stores in Thailand.Job descriptionOur Sport Leaders are responsible for customer service and sales, department profitability as well as building and coaching teams within their department. You’ll be making decisions for the business from day one by analyzing and planning your commercial activity, forming new ways to boost your sport’s range of products for your local customers and engaging your sports users through the organization of events in and out of the store. Your determination coupled with our training will teach you the fundamentals of how to grow your market share for your favourite sport. You are encouraged to think outside the box and unleash your entrepreneurial spirit.Your responsibilitiesTeam Player - The business and the customer always comes first, together with your colleagues you will ensure that your in-store business is commercial and efficient day by day .Digital - As the retail continues to evolve, you will have the freedom to discover new ways to build your brand through social media and other digital channels.Partnerships - Once your business is thriving in store and online, you can reach out into your community and work with your local sport clubs/schools/businesses to develop partnerships. Here is where you will apply your networking skills in order to strengthen your brand and to make your sport accessible within your community.Customer Service - Your customers will always be your number one priority, you will have the means to listen to their feedback in order to make improvements to your business. At Decathlon we ensure that all our customers remain loyal through our Satisfied or Satisfied policy.Sport business - You will build the best product offering for your customer. You will choose all of your ranges within your sport, adapting your business to the current market. You will organise events in your local area to increase brand awareness and customer participation in sport.']
job_qualifications: ["s• Passionate about sports and excited by your potential to drive impact change in people• Positive, hands-on attitude with a desire to learn• Embrace responsibility and vitality• Able to thrive in a fast-paced environment• Great listener, communicator, and team player• Strong leadership qualities, previous experience in management is a plus• Experience with social media campaigns and data analytics• Basic knowledge of Office and Google Suite is necessary• Flexible schedule and availability on weekends is a mustAdditional information• Competitive salary• Health insurance• Performance bonus• Provident fund• Generous employee discount• A learning environment where you can dive deep and make an impact• Be a shareholder, with an exclusive annual option to invest in Decathlon’s Shares• Wide range of career opportunities locally and globallyWE ARE LOOKING FOR PASSIONATE SPORT LOVERS. IF YOU LOVE ANY OF THESE SPORTS, LET'S JOIN US!Body Building Fitness Cadio Cross training CampingHiking Trekking Walking Wildlife observation More informationhttps://bethechange.decathlon.com "]

You’ll be making decisions for the business from day one by analyzing and planning your commercial activity, forming new ways to boost your sport’s range of products for your local customers and engaging your sports users through the organization of events in and out of the store. Your determination coupled with our training will teach you the fundamentals of how to grow your market share for your favourite sport. You are encouraged to think outside the box and unleash your entrepreneurial spirit.Your responsibilitiesTeam Player - The business and the customer always comes first, together with your colleagues you will ensure that your in-store business is commercial and efficient day by day .Digital - As the retail continues to evolve, you will have the freedom to discover new ways to build your brand through social media and other digital channels.Partnerships - Once your business is thriving in store and online, you can reach out into your community and work with your local sport clubs/schools/businesses to develop partnerships. Here is where you will apply your networking skills in order to strengthen your brand and to make your sport accessible within your community.Customer Service - Your customers will always be your number one priority, you will have the means to listen to their feedback in order to make improvements to your business. At Decathlon we ensure that all our customers remain loyal through our Satisfied or Satisfied policy.Sport business - You will build the best product offering for your customer. You will choose all of your ranges within your sport, adapting your business to the current market. You will organise events in your local area to increase brand awareness and customer participation in sport.Qualifications• Passionate about sports and excited by your potential to drive impact change in people• Positive, hands-on attitude with a desire to learn• Embrace responsibility and vitality• Able to thrive in a fast-paced environment• Great listener, communicator, and team player• Strong leadership qualities, previous experience in management is a plus• Experience with social media campaigns and data analytics• Basic knowledge of Office and Google Suite is necessary• Flexible schedule and availability on weekends is a mustAdditional information• Competitive salary• Health insurance• Performance bonus• Provident fund• Generous employee discount• A learning environment where you can dive deep and make an impact• Be a shareholder, with an exclusive annual option to invest in Decathlon’s Shares• Wide range of career opportunities locally and globallyWE ARE LOOKING FOR PASSIONATE SPORT LOVERS. IF YOU LOVE ANY OF THESE SPORTS, LET'S JOIN US!Body Building Fitness Cadio Cross training CampingHiking Trekking Walking Wildlife observation More informationhttps://bethechange.decathlon.com

job_responsibilities: ['Position :IT Sales ExecutiveKey Responsibility :To sell SGS products to clients in such a way to ensure that all required conversion rates for proposals and contracts are met and to ensure that all proposals are followed up in a manner that ensures that SGS-SSC exceeds customer’s expectations. To report back to management of trends in demand for products and movements in the market including reporting on problems incurred in selling identified products.Aim at achieving sound of customer satisfaction for sale function.To coach up CSO team to ensure that the sales targets of are met.To handle international sales effectively, respond to service inquiry timely and accurately.To initiate idea for market events, so as to expand sales for desired zone and SSC products.Carry out effective sales planning in allocated location to ensure client visit targets are met. Records of weekly sales plans are to be to be maintained.Ensure all Monthly reports are accurate and on-time, e.g. Sales Monthly Report and TH Breakdown.Ensure all sales targets and contract targets per month are achievedConducting sales presentations to clients on SGS Products and services and record results of all client visits.Preparation of proposals (where necessary), follow-up on all proposals and recording of the results of such.Monitor proposals and contract conversion rates with the aim of achieving targets.Conduct all price negotiation with in set limits and ensure as many as possible contracts are taken.Update all information on CertNET (Certification Management System).Conduct work as per relevant SGS-SSC procedures.Plan and Execute action of Key account management for Key client and key consultant.Provide coaching to Sales Staff i.e. sales process, sales database and selling techniques etc.Responding and sale for international inquiries, i.e. proposal & contracting, project planning and coordinate for technical issues.Identify cold call list, potential SSC market in zone and industrial sector or specific product and reporting to Manager.Promote key account clients business relation by conducting call & visits regularly for the assigned Key Accounts.Ensure the effectively manage marketing project and selling project.To control Sales Materials are up to date and have sufficient amount in stock.Authorize to sign Contracts with clients on behalf of SGS (Thailand) Limited according to SGS Price Structure.']
job_qualifications: [":Bachelor's Degree in IT, Computer Engineer, Computer Science, Business Computer.3 years proven experience in IT project selling. The ISO certification/project is an advantage.Excellent telephone manner including proven communication / interpersonal skillsHighly developed public speaking skillsProven team player and ability to work with very little supervisionLogical approach to problem solvingGood organizational skills including report writingGood command in English in both of speaking and writing.Passed Internal Auditor course ISO 27001 course or other IT management system training course.National Higher Certificate or equivalent in relevant discipline.Human Resources DepartmentSGS (Thailand) Limited100 Nanglinchee Road Chongnonsee YannawaBangkok 10120 ThailandTel : +66 (0)2 678 18 13 Ext 1117Fax : +66 (0)2 678 1541 "]

job_responsibilities: ['Responsibilities:Manage every aspect of our newly expanding operation in-countryRecruit the very best talent in this new marketNegotiate with vendors and service providers needed for productionCollaborate with local businesses to acquire all necessary resources and servicesConduct extensive research regarding the market and learn everything possibleDevelop marketing and production teams with local expertiseCollaborate with leadership to strategize how best to roll out the product lineBecome a student of the culture, remaining aware of customs and manners alwaysSynthesize monthly, quarterly, and annual reports on progress and developmentNetwork effectively with local clients and develop strong professional relationshipsWork to ensure deadlines are met and budgets are maintainedAdapt the business model to be culturally relevant without losing its identityMentor direct reports, especially in regard to our values and visionContribute to the overall global success of our company']
job_qualifications: ['s:Bachelor’s degree in Engineer, Science or Business Administration10 years’ or more experience in management in an international business settingSignificant experience in Sales Engineer & OperationsFluent in EnglishExperience living overseas for an extended period of timeExceptionally well organized and driven by successAbility to thrive in high-pressure situationsOutstanding negotiating skillsAnalytical thinker with superior problem-solving skillsSolid history of data-driven strategic developmentDecisive and committedA natural leader who inspires and motivates those around them ']
job_description: Responsibilities:Manage every aspect of our newly expanding operation in-countryRecruit the very best talent in this new marketNegotiate with vendors and service providers needed for productionCollaborate with local businesses to acquire all necessary resources and servicesConduct extensive research regarding the market and learn everything possibleDevelop marketing and production teams with local expertiseCollaborate with leadership to strategize how best to roll out the product lineBecome a student of the culture, remaining aware of customs and manners alwaysSynthesize monthly, quarterly, and annual reports on progress and developmentNetwork effectively with local clients and develop strong professional relationshipsWork to ensure deadlines are met and budgets are maintainedAdapt the business model to be culturally relevant without losing its identityMentor direct reports, especially in regard to our values and visionContribute to the overall global success of our companyQualifications:Bachelor’s degree in Engineer, Science or Business Administration10 years’ or more experience in management in an international business settingSignificant experience in Sales Engineer & OperationsFluent in EnglishExperience living overseas for an extended period of timeExceptionally well organized and driven by successAbility to thrive in high-pressure situationsOutstanding negotiating skillsAnalytical thinker with superior problem-solving skillsSolid history of data-driven strategic developmentDecisive and committedA natural leader who inspires and motivates those around them

job_title: Government Partnership Executive (Focus on Government Sector)
job_responsibilities: ['ResponsibilitiesHelp to expand SGS’s services to government sectorMessaging to communicate benefits of micro-mobility to various stakeholdersCreating new business leads and converting inbound inquiries into opportunities.Contacting potential clients by email/phone/social media/conferences to create opportunitiesBuilding strong rapport with clients to drive long-term relationships, including city staff, elected officials, and community groups.Building a strong department and company culture.Dedicated and driven to closing the deal and growing our company quickly and responsibly.Support the Director in tracking the regions’ progress, including managing the company’s CRM and reporting to the Director and Head of Government Partnerships. Develop content to support presentations, email campaigns, conference booths,\u200b \u200betc.This person will focus on only Government Sector.']
job_qualifications: ['s3+ years of experience in Business Development, Government Relations in a relevant industryStrong proposal writing, communication, and interpersonal skills.Experience lobbying for public policies and a highly competitive market.Ability to prioritize and maintain attention to detail.Experience navigating bureaucracy and interacting with various stakeholders.Experience in public speaking, especially in front of elected officials - for example, giving public comment at a City Council meeting.Thorough attention to detail when analyzing regulatory frameworks, and the ability to strategically lobby. ']
job_description: ResponsibilitiesHelp to expand SGS’s services to government sectorMessaging to communicate benefits of micro-mobility to various stakeholdersCreating new business leads and converting inbound inquiries into opportunities.Contacting potential clients by email/phone/social media/conferences to create opportunitiesBuilding strong rapport with clients to drive long-term relationships, including city staff, elected officials, and community groups.Building a strong department and company culture.Dedicated and driven to closing the deal and growing our company quickly and responsibly.Support the Director in tracking the regions’ progress, including managing the company’s CRM and reporting to the Director and Head of Government Partnerships. Develop content to support presentations, email campaigns, conference booths,​ ​etc.This person will focus on only Government Sector.Qualifications3+ years of experience in Business Development, Government Relations in a relevant industryStrong proposal writing, communication, and interpersonal skills.Experience lobbying for public policies and a highly competitive market.Ability to prioritize and maintain attention to detail.Experience navigating bureaucracy and interacting with various stakeholders.Experience in public speaking, especially in front of elected officials - for example, giving public comment at a City Council meeting.Thorough attention to detail when analyzing regulatory frameworks, and the ability to strategically lobby.

ResponsibilitiesCoordinate project management activities, resources, equipment and informationBreak projects into doable actions and set timeframes Liaise with clients to identify and define requirements, scope and objectivesAssign tasks to internal teams and assist with schedule management Make sure that clients’ needs are met as projects evolve Help prepare budgets Analyze risks and opportunities Oversee project procurement management Monitor project progress and handle any issues that arise Act as the point of contact and communicate project status to all participantsWork with the Project Manager to eliminate blockers Use tools to monitor working hours, plans and expenditures Issue all appropriate legal paperwork (e.g. contracts and terms of agreement)Create and maintain comprehensive project documentation, plans and reports Ensure standards and requirements are met through conducting quality assurance testsRequirementBachelor's degree in Engineer / Science / Business / Proven work experience as a Project Coordinator or similar role Experience in project management, from conception to delivery An ability to prepare and interpret flowcharts, schedules and step-by-step action plansSolid organizational skills, including multitasking and time-management Strong client-facing and teamwork skills Familiarity with risk management and quality assurance control Strong working knowledge of Microsoft Project and Microsoft Planner

The ISO certification/project is an advantage.Excellent telephone manner including proven communication / interpersonal skillsHighly developed public speaking skillsProven team player and ability to work with very little supervisionLogical approach to problem solvingGood organizational skills including report writingGood command in English in both of speaking and writing.Passed Internal Auditor course ISO 27001 course or other IT management system training course.National Higher Certificate or equivalent in relevant discipline.Human Resources DepartmentSGS (Thailand) Limited100 Nanglinchee Road Chongnonsee YannawaBangkok 10120 ThailandTel : +66 (0)2 678 18 13 Ext 1117Fax : +66 (0)2 678 1541

job_description: 1. Business and Management Associate/ Entry Level(F-T/P-T: 23,000 to 30,000 THB Salary)The successful candidate will undergo a short training program on attitude and behavioral changes to prepare for the following role and responsibilities:Helps identify and expand Thailand's marketManages clientele relationships for business renewals against overall KPIs Supports day-to-day tasks for CEO and internal stakeholders Manages pool of GameMasters and GameFacilitators after certified training and examinationPerforms GameMaster/GameFacilitator duty at Gameplay eventsGathers data at and after Gameplay for feedback analysis and learning assessment reportsQualifications:Thai Female with good personality aged below 30 years oldMinimum Bachelor degree in any fieldComfortable under environment with pressure and challengesPossess interpersonal and coordinating skills with positive and ‘Can Do’ attitudesEnjoy socializing, traveling, and working flexible hours on and off sites Outgoing and open-minded to learning and developing for future leadershipGood command of English, both writing and speakingAble to work on Microsoft Offices; Windows, Excel, Power Points, etc.2. ผู้ฝึกอบรม(GameMaster)/ผู้ช่วยฝึกอบรม (GameFacilitator)(Part-Timeด่วน! ต้องการจำนวนหลายอัตรา)(พนักงานพาร์ทไทม์หรือรายวัน: 1,000 to 5,000 THBต่อวัน ขึ้นอยู่กับตำแหน่ง)ไม่ใช่งานขาย (เป็นการจัดฝึกอบรมให้ความรู้)คุณสมบัติ(ไม่จำเป็นต้องมีประสบการณ์การทำงาน):ชาย/หญิง มีบุคลิกภาพดี มีใจบริการ อายุ ระหว่าง 18 ถึง 35 ปี สัญชาติไทยมีความกระตือรือร้น ทัศนคติเชิงบวก และชอบงานเเนวกิจกรรมรักในการเดินทาง มีมนุษยสัมพันธ์ที่ดี ยืดหยุ่นกับเวลาทำงาน และสามารถทำงานนอกสถานที่ได้เปิดใจและพร้อมเสมอในการเรียนรู้สิ่งใหม่ๆ โดยเฉพาะความรู้ด้านการเงิน*บริษัทมีการจัดฝึกอบรมรับรองคุณสมบัติในการทำงานโดยไม่มีค่าใช้จ่ายใดๆ*

หน้าที่และความรับผิดชอบ :พัฒนาและวางแผนการตลาด,ส่งเสริมการขาย และรับผิดชอบการขายภายในประเทศ ทั้ง Online และ Offlineบริหารจัดการพัฒนาโซเชียลมีเดียของบริษัท เพื่อให้เกิดการรับรู้ ให้สินค้าเป็นที่รู้จักพร้อมทั้งพัฒนาตราสินค้าศึกษาความเป็นไปได้ และพัฒนากลยุทธ์ เพื่อแนวทางการพัฒนาธุรกิจวัดและประเมินผลแผนส่งเสริมการตลาด เพื่อนำมาใช้ในการวางแผนการขาย เพื่อให้เป็นไปตามเป้าหมายบริษัทวิเคราะห์คู่แข่งและแนวโน้ม ช่องทางการขายของตลาดOnline แต่ละประเภท เพื่อให้สามารถแข่งขันในตลาดได้รับผิดชอบการขายModern Trade รับผิดชอบProject ที่เกี่ยวข้อง รับมอบหมายจาก CEOงานอื่นๆ ที่เกี่ยวข้องคุณสมบัติ :เพศชาย/หญิง อายุ 24-30 ปี ประสบการณ์ 1-4 ปีปริญญาตรี สาขาการตลาด , บริหาร ,การตลาดออนไลน์ , นิเทศศาสตร์ หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้องมีความรู้เกี่ยวกับการตลาดออนไลน์ เช่น Google Ads , Facebook Ads , Line Officialมีประสบการณ์ในการพัฒนา SEO/SEMสามารถใช้งาน Microsoft office (Excel , Word , PowerPoint) และGmail ได้คล่องสามารถใช้ภาษาอังกฤษในการสื่อสารและนำเสนองานได้อย่างคล่องแคล่วมีประสบการณ์ในการทำการตลาดออนไลน์และModern Tradeมีประสบการณ์ในการวางแผนกลยุทธทางการตลาด พัฒนาผลิตภัณฑ์ พัฒนาองค์กรอย่างน้อย 3 ปีมีความรู้เกี่ยวกับ Graphic Design จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษสามารถเขียนคอนเทนต์ Facebook และ Website เป็นภาษาอังกฤษมีประสบการณ์และมีความเข้าใจในธุรกิจอาหารจะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษสามารถทำงานเป็นทีมได้ สามารถทำงานภายใต้แรงกดดันและเสร็จตามกำหนดสามารถทำงานต่างจังหวัดได้ มีรถยนต์และใบขับขี่จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษโปรดแนบใบรับรองการทำงานสวัสดิการเครื่องแบบประกันสังคมกองทุนเงินทดแทนโบนัส, คอมมิชชั่น งานเลี้ยงสังสรรค์ และของขวัญปีใหม่ประกันสุขภาพตรวจสุขภาพประจำปีHow to applyClickAPPLY NOW for submit your applicationInterested applicants are invited to applying person or send application with full resume indicating qualifications and experience, transcript, expected salary and recent photo to:  K. job_description: Business Development Manager BD Manager Our Client are an established company who are looking for a Business development manager who can speak fluent English. Expanding their team due to the high amount of success in the past year. they are currently recruiting for exceptional individuals who have the desire make opportunities and seize them with both hands. The Ideal candidate will be responsible for Generating new Business leads and coordinating with the back-office team Managing and coordinating activities within their team, as ensuring being the first point of contact for all departments Devise strategy plans to ensure that the correct audience is being targeted and maximizing leads Plan and ensure sales targets are met and coach junior team members on how to make new contacts Qualifications Previous experience in a Management role in business development preferably in Construction/related industry Must have a degree in Business or related expertise. Excellent leadership skills to teach, train your team and to implement new ideas to increase leads/salesProven track record of generating and maintaining leads and converting them into salesOpen to Thai and Japanese nationals If you feel you are the right candidate and are an ambitious individual who likes to be in control of their own income, then please feel free to reach out and find out more details. Learning Experience ArchitectYou provide consultative product expertise to the sales process, direct design efforts post-sale, and own design for high-priority clients.Role descriptionSales Engineering & Discovery(Discover phases of 6Ds)o Support Account Directors throughout the sales funnel(e.g., working sessions, proposal development, pitch meetings)by establishing consultative, advisory relationships with client stakeholders.o Lead need-analysis sessions with clients to scope and uncover organizational training needs or define learning objectives within identified areas of interest. o Make product recommendations to achieve the client’s objectives, or advise on conditions and constraints for when TDA is not well suited to deliver. Design & Development(Discover, Deep Dive, Design phases of 6Ds)o Own full design process for complex or high-priority engagements, including working with subject matter expert to design curriculum for enterprise clients (based on existing curriculum or newly made) o Oversee learning outcomes of programs developed.Evaluate program successProductizationo Work with various teams to maintain, create, or expand new products for TDA portfolio, and explore new opportunities in the market.Required skillsKnowledge on digital content/topics a big plus(e.g., technology, data and analytics, digital marketing, product management, UX, cybersecurity)Customer-focused:Dedicated to meeting the expectations and requirements of internal and external customers; gets first-hand customer information and uses it for improvements in products and services; acts with customers in mind; establishes and maintains effective relationships with customers and gains their trust and respectLearning on the fly:Learns quickly when facing new problems; a relentless and versatile learner; open to change; analyzes both successes and failures for clues to improvement; experiments and will try anything to find solutions; enjoys the challenge of unfamiliar tasks; quickly grasps the essence and the underlying structure of anything.Decision-quality and problem solving:Uses analysis, wisdom, experience, and logical methods to make good decisions and solve difficult problems with effective solutions; appropriately incorporates multiple inputs to establish shared ownership and effective action.Dealing with ambiguity:Can effectively cope with change; can shift gears comfortably; can decide and act without having the total picture; isn’t upset when things are up in the air; doesn’t have to finish things before moving on; can comfortably handle risk and uncertainty.Presentation skills:is effective in a variety of formal presentation settings:one-on-one, small and large groups, with clients, peers, direct reports, and bosses; can sense the room and change tactics midstream when information isn’t being well-received or something isn’t working

หน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบ- วางแผนด้านการสื่อสารในช่องทาง social media- บริหารจัดการทีมงาน เพื่อปฏิบัติตามแผนที่วางไว้ที่ก่อให้เกิดประสิทธิภาพสูงสุด- บริหารจัดการทีม Online content editors เพื่อพัฒนาเนื้อหาต่างๆ ได้อย่างสร้างสรรค์ ให้เข้าถึงกลุ่มเป้าหมายที่ต้องการ- วิเคราะห์ผล Analytics ต่างๆ เพื่อที่จะสามารถทำให้งานของตัวเองนั้นดีขึ้นได้ และตอบโจทย์ที่วางไว้ในตอนต้นคุณสมบัติของผู้สมัคร- อายุ 28 – 38 ปี วุฒิการศึกษาปริญญาตรีขึ้นไป- รักในสายงานตลาดออนไลน์- มีประสบการณ์บริหารจัดการทีมงานออนไลน์อย่างน้อย 3 ปี- มีความสามารถในการบริหารจัดการ Campaign และ Timeline งานต่างๆ ได้ดีมาก- มีความเข้าใจในการกระจายตัวของเนื้อหาในช่องทาง Social media ต่างๆ (share, engagement, viral post, etc.)- มีความเป็นผู้นำสูง และสามารถตัดสินใจได้ด้วยว่าจะทำอะไร หรือไม่ควรทำอะไร- มีความกระตือรือร้นในการทำงาน- เปิดใจเรียนรู้ และพัฒนาตัวเองอยู่ตลอดเวลา- ชอบริเริ่มพัฒนาวิธีการทำงานในรูปแบบใหม่ๆ- สามารถทำงานภายใต้แรงกดดันได้ดี

job_title: Business Development Engineer/วิศวกรด้านการพัฒนาธุรกิจ
job_description: Job Purpose1. Responsible for the study and planning of the project from the beginning of the project until the completion of it.2. Support and coordinate with various agencies within the organization so that the project assigned is successful.3. Coordinate with other external organizations to obtain the information needed to complete the project.4. Process and obtain all the documents that are necessary to use in the bidding process.5. Strengthen, develop and maintain relationships with customers and partners involved in assigned projects.Task and ResponsibilitiesStudy and research for the assigned project. • Study, research and analyze information on the potential problems, opportunities, weakness, strengths that can occur in different situations that the organization may face. Determine possible competitors, clients and the potential that each of them will affect the development of the project. • Study the technical data, information and the scope of the project to analyze the potential risks that can occur.Prepare proposals for business operations that are related to business development and strategy to create a successful project for the organization.• Compose proposals related to the business development and strategy of the project; this includes project offering concepts, presentations, project proposals and other relevant details. The proposal’s main goal is to present potential ideas to clients and/or to present opportunities to create success in the organization. Coordinate and work with internal and external organizations both locally and internationally.• Coordinate with both external and internal agencies such as business partners or any agencies related to the project in a global scale.Strengthen, develop and maintain relationships with customers and partners• Maintain and develop relationships with existing or potential customers / partners to increase the opportunity to expand the business volume of the organization.Job SpecificationEducation Background Bachelor Degree of EngineeringProfessional Experiences minimum 3 yearsComputer Software Microsoft PowerPoint , Excel , MATLAB , Siemens NX , ABAQUS CAE

Kaidee is seeking a Business Development Executive who love technology and is passionate about Automotive to join us.We offer a creative working space for team to think and open to share idea – that is why we stay out of the comfort zone to learn what Thai people want in order to offer a platform our customers love to use.We are committed to investing in people and tools to produce the best platform and continued improvement.Responsibilities;Collecting market insights and keeping up to date, local trends and newsEstablishing contact and developing relationships with the car dealer and agencies (would be advantage)Analyze the competitive sales environment, ensure that our proposals remain attractiveCommunicating effectively to manage client expectations to ensure they receive a great Kaidee experienceBeing the first point of contact with the client including as the initial technical reference pointRequirements;3 to 5 years experience as a sales consultant in the vehicle industry or other industries that serve Automotive like banking, insurance, etc,Have online sales experience is a plusPassionate about vehicle industryExcellent communication skills, good negotiation and presentationAn energetic, mature, accountable, self – driven, fast learner and has strong analytical skillAbility to work in a target driven companyAbility to work and visit customer in upcountryCar and Driving license as this role required you to attend many out-of-office meetings.Welfare & Benefits;Flexible hoursTown Hall & Happy Friday (Food & Drink provided)Free Lunch every dayTraining in-house & AbroadProvident Fund (5 or 10%)Life / Accident / Disability / Health InsuranceDentalVacation leave & Birthday leave

ResponsibilitiesCoordinate project management activities, resources, equipment and informationBreak projects into doable actions and set timeframes Liaise with clients to identify and define requirements, scope and objectivesAssign tasks to internal teams and assist with schedule management Make sure that clients’ needs are met as projects evolve Help prepare budgets Analyze risks and opportunities Oversee project procurement management Monitor project progress and handle any issues that arise Act as the point of contact and communicate project status to all participantsWork with the Project Manager to eliminate blockers Use tools to monitor working hours, plans and expenditures Issue all appropriate legal paperwork (e.g. contracts and terms of agreement)Create and maintain comprehensive project documentation, plans and reports Ensure standards and requirements are met through conducting quality assurance testsRequirementBachelor's degree in Engineer / Science / Business / Proven work experience as a Project Coordinator or similar role Experience in project management, from conception to delivery An ability to prepare and interpret flowcharts, schedules and step-by-step action plansSolid organizational skills, including multitasking and time-management Strong client-facing and teamwork skills Familiarity with risk management and quality assurance control Strong working knowledge of Microsoft Project and Microsoft Planner

job_responsibilities: ['Position :IT Sales ExecutiveKey Responsibility :To sell SGS products to clients in such a way to ensure that all required conversion rates for proposals and contracts are met and to ensure that all proposals are followed up in a manner that ensures that SGS-SSC exceeds customer’s expectations. To report back to management of trends in demand for products and movements in the market including reporting on problems incurred in selling identified products.Aim at achieving sound of customer satisfaction for sale function.To coach up CSO team to ensure that the sales targets of are met.To handle international sales effectively, respond to service inquiry timely and accurately.To initiate idea for market events, so as to expand sales for desired zone and SSC products.Carry out effective sales planning in allocated location to ensure client visit targets are met. Records of weekly sales plans are to be to be maintained.Ensure all Monthly reports are accurate and on-time, e.g. Sales Monthly Report and TH Breakdown.Ensure all sales targets and contract targets per month are achievedConducting sales presentations to clients on SGS Products and services and record results of all client visits.Preparation of proposals (where necessary), follow-up on all proposals and recording of the results of such.Monitor proposals and contract conversion rates with the aim of achieving targets.Conduct all price negotiation with in set limits and ensure as many as possible contracts are taken.Update all information on CertNET (Certification Management System).Conduct work as per relevant SGS-SSC procedures.Plan and Execute action of Key account management for Key client and key consultant.Provide coaching to Sales Staff i.e. sales process, sales database and selling techniques etc.Responding and sale for international inquiries, i.e. proposal & contracting, project planning and coordinate for technical issues.Identify cold call list, potential SSC market in zone and industrial sector or specific product and reporting to Manager.Promote key account clients business relation by conducting call & visits regularly for the assigned Key Accounts.Ensure the effectively manage marketing project and selling project.To control Sales Materials are up to date and have sufficient amount in stock.Authorize to sign Contracts with clients on behalf of SGS (Thailand) Limited according to SGS Price Structure.']

job_description: หน้าที่และความรับผิดชอบ:การศึกษางานโครงการแสวงหาโอกาสทางธุรกิจใหม่ๆ และศึกษารายละเอียดโครงการการลงทุนในธุรกิจต่างๆ ตามที่ได้รับมอบหมายรวบรวมและวิเคราะห์ข้อมูล ศึกษาความเป็นไปได้ในการลงทุน และผลตอบแทนในโครงการต่างๆ เพื่อนำเสนอทางเลือกที่เหมาะสมให้กับผู้บังคับบัญชาจัดทำแผนธุรกิจ และนำเสนอรายงานต่างๆ ที่เกี่ยวข้องกับโครงการที่รับมอบหมายการควบคุมโครงการประมาณการงบประมาณของโครงการควบคุมงบประมาณและติดตามความคืบหน้าของโครงการเสนอแนวทางในการแก้ไขปัญหาอุปสรรคกับฝ่ายที่เกี่ยวข้องร่วมวางแผน ประชุมกับฝ่ายต่างๆ ที่เกี่ยวข้องนำเสนอ จัดทำรายงานของโครงการที่เกี่ยวข้องการติดตามผลการดำเนินงานวิเคราะห์ผลการดำเนินงานของโครงการตามที่ได้รับมอบหมายนำเสนอรายงานตามที่ได้รับมอบหมายดำเนินการตามที่ได้รับมอบหมายคุณสมบัติประจำตำแหน่ง:เพศชาย / หญิง อายุ 27 ปีขึ้นไปวุฒิการศึกษาปริญญาตรีและปริญญาโท ในสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้องมีประสบการณ์ 3 - 5 ปี ในสายงานที่เกี่ยวข้องมีทักษะในการวิเคราะห์ธุรกิจ สามารถอ่านและวิเคราะห์งบการเงินได้ ความรู้ทางด้านคอมพิวเตอร์ทักษะการคำนวณทางคณิตศาสตร์ การวางแผน และ การนำเสนอรายงานมีความรับผิดชอบ กระตือรือร้น มีมนุษยสัมพันธ์ แก้ปัญหาเฉพาะหน้าได้ สามารถทำงานเป็นทีมมีความอดทน สามารถรับแรงกดดันได้ดี มีความมุ่งมั่นที่จะสร้างความสำเร็จ ทำงานเร็วและติดตามงานAttractive remuneration package and welfare including career advancement opportunity will be provided to the right candidate commensurately to working experiences and qualifications such as :BonusMedical Fee (OPD, IPD)Life /Accident InsuranceAnnual Check-upProvident FundSaving CoorperativeSocial SecurityFuneral ceremony allowanceUniformInterested candidates please send application letter with your resume stating full qualifications, experience, current as well as expected remuneration and a recent photograph to an e-mail address below.MBK Public Company Limited444 8flr., Phayathai Road, Wangmai, Patumwan,Bangkok 10330 Thailand.Tel: 02-853-7223,02-853-7217 Fax.02-853-7000Website:www.mbk-center.co.thThe candidates invite to apply in person onMonday- Friday in morning at 10.00 - 11.00 AM. and in afternoon at 13.00 - 16.00 PM.(ยกเว้นวันหยุดนักขัตฤกษ์)

Major Responsibilities• Develop launching plans and strategy, along with sales target, A&P, and business plan to purpose to CMO and BOD.• Analyze and study to understand Chinese consumer behavior, both online and offline.• Work with relevant team to analyze and develop strategy to launch product, brand, and marketing campaign into China.•Work with agencies on creative development to motivate the target audience to “take action”.•Develop good relationship and work with distributor to push sales and distribution coverage and monitor distribution expenditure and efficiency.•Monitor market trends, research consumer markets and competitors’ activities.•Measure and report performance of all marketing campaigns, A&P cost efficiency.Professional Experience• Proven working experience related to branding or marketing in FMCG area • Ability to develop marketing strategies and communicate recommendations to executives• Understanding of marketing mix• Strong analytical skills partnered with a creative mind• Data-driven thinking and an affinity for numbers• Outstanding communication skills• Up-to-date with latest trends and marketing best practices• Degree in marketing or a related field

Major Responsibilities• To assist in various international business innovation developments• To drive cross-functional network teams to deliver innovations on-time and in-full• To assist in various international business strategies and plans• To implement international expansion project by working with local partners & cross functional teamProfessional Experience• Proven working experience as brand manager or associate brand manager• Ability to develop marketing strategies and communicate recommendations to executives• Understanding of marketing mix• Strong analytical skills partnered with a creative mind• Data-driven thinking and an affinity for numbers• Outstanding communication skills• Up-to-date with latest trends and marketing best practicesOthers Requirements•Enthusiastic and Agile•Passionate to win/high energy•Good listening skill•Possess good collaboration•Demonstrate Good Team player

job_title: Field Application Engineer / Japanese Electronic components / BTS Phrom Phong / 42K
job_responsibilities: ['Our client is theleading Japanese Electronic components which the office is located close toBTS Phrom Phong station is currently looking for a qualified candidate as a below information.Job responsibilitiesCo-work with Sales team to provide technical information and support to promote their products.Drive designing of the products, and support customers for their designs.Develop and expand more business as spearhead, and bring in new customers.Co-work and align with suppliers for all technical promotion activities.Support customers for implementing the products']
job_qualifications: ["sThai Male / Female, age not over 33 years old.Bachelor’s degree in Electronics & Electrical Engineering.At least 1–2 Years experiences of Field Application Engineer, Technical Sales or Sales Engineer for Electronics partsKnowledge in MCU (Memory Control Unit), Industrial Power and Motor Control.Be able to travel to oversea.Good command of spoken and written in English (experienced in reporting to the expatriates)Have experience of using Excel and Power Point in work.Possess the driving license and own car (to visit customer's office and sites) will be an advantageMore InformationSalary:42K (Salary is depend upon work experience and skill)Benefits: **Welfare and benefits provided - will be informed upon the interview process**Working days:Mon – Fri (8.30 a.m. – 5.15 p.m.) *All applications will be treated in strict confidence. All material submitted in connection with your application will become part of our confidential recruitment files. job_description: Position SummarySKOTOAR is seeking a Business Development Executive who love technology and passionate about on-demand logistics to join us. Business Development Executive plays a critical role in growth of SKOOTAR by leading the business development, B2B client project management and B2B client relationship management. You will be part of the Business Development team and will also align with the high impact oriented and team focused culture of SKOOTAR within the fun and active work environment of the team.Expected Roles • Expand and maintain relationship with top spenders/B2B project clients• Find the efficient way to approach the new and existing customers in the area assigned• Act as the main contact person for assigned B2B project clients and attack problem areas and build a strong relationship between SKOOTAR and the clients• Collaborate with the clients to understand their needs / requirements and work with internal teams to provide the client with the best solution possible• Recommends changes in products, service and policy by evaluating results and user feedback• Be accountable for targets being achieved in a timely manner.Basic Qualifications• Bachelor degree or higher in business or related field.• A minimum of 2 years experience in BD, Project management or B2B account management• Excellent in communications (Verbal and Writing) in both Thai and English• Experience in logistics and/or technology product is a plus• Team player with self-motivated/resulted oriented work attitude, strong work ethic, and humility• Social character with a positive attitude towards new challenges and a hands-on mentalityBenefits• High impact role with room to grow and do what you love• Startup and entrepreneurship culture which values impactful change rather than status quo• Work with fun, smart yet humble team• Quarterly/Monthly office party

job_title: Sales Manager /ผู้จัดการฝ่ายขาย
job_description: รายละเอียดงาน:บริหารทีมงานขายขนาด10-20คน ซึ่งทำงานในพื้นที่ต่างๆ กันได้แก่ พื้นที่สาธารณะนอกอาคาร ห้งสรรพสินค้า อาคารสำนักงาน และโรดโชว์ ในเขตกรุงเทพมหานครคัดเลือก ฝึกอบรม สร้างแรงบันดาลใจ และพัฒนาบุคลากร เพื่อการเติบโตได้ตามเป้าหมายเป็นผู้นำของทีมงานขาย และแบบอย่างที่ดีในการบรรลุเป้าหมายของตัวเอง และเป้าหมายของทีมฝึกสอน และให้คำปรึกษาแก่ทีมงานข้อเสนอของเรา:เงินเดือน และค่าคอมมิชชั่นการสนับสนุนในด้านการสรรหาและคัดเลือกพนักงานเข้าสู่ทีมงาน โดยฝ่ายทรัพยากรบุคคล (เพื่อเป้าหมายในการฝึกอบรมและพัฒนาบุคลากรในทีมงานให้้มีประสิทธิภาพ)บริหารทีมงานขายและระดมทุนซึ่งได้รับสวัสดิการที่ดีสิทธิ์ในการถือหุ้นของบริษัทฯ (เรามองหาเพื่อนร่วมงาน ไม่ใช่แค่พนักงาน)บรรยากาศในการทำงานที่สนุกสนาน เป็นกันเอง:การร่วมแสดงความยินดี การให้โบนัสตามผลงาน การสร้างแรงจูงใจ งานเลี้ยงสังสรรค์รายเดือน และกิจกรรมสร้างความสัมพันธ์รายไตรมาศการฝึกอบรม และการสนับสนุนอย่างใกล้ชิดจากผู้บริหาร เทรนเนอร์ และเพือนร่วมงานทุกคนโอกาสในการเริ่มต้นสร้างทีมงานโอกาสในการเดินทางไปสำนักงานอื่นๆ ในเอเชีย ได้แก่ ประเทศสิงคโปร์ และมาเลเซียประกันสังคม วันลาหยุด และผลประโยชน์อื่นๆ ตามที่บริษัทฯ กำหนดคุณสมบัติของผู้สมัคร:มีประสบการณ์ในการบริหารทีมงานขายอย่างน้อย 3-5 ปีอายุ 27ปี - 35ปีมีประสบการณ์ในด้านการระดมทุนจะได้รับการพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษมีพลังและความกระตือรือร้นสูง ซึ่งสามารถส่งต่อให้กับทีมงานได้มีความยืดหยุ่น และมีความมุ่งมั่นที่จะบรรลุเป้าหมายสามารถสร้างมาตรฐานที่สูงให้แก่ทีมงาน ในขณะที่ยังรักษาความเข้าอกเข้าใจและความสัมพันธ์กับทีมงานได้เป็นอย่างดีสามารถปรับตัวได้ดี (สามาถรับมือกับความเปลี่ยนแปลงได้อย่างต่อเนื่อง)Omniraise Co., Ltd.1106 Spaces Summer Hill, 3rd Floor,Summer Hill, Sukhumvit Road,Prakanong, Klongtoey, Bangkok, 10110
